ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of
ygData.msgSnippet: i still remember the day...  Avatar room, Cazic-Thule, wondering why the hell all those lizards kept hitting me, swimming up the bubble and dying in the hall
ygData.messageBody:
i still remember the day... Avatar room, Cazic-Thule, wondering why the
hell all those lizards kept hitting me, swimming up the bubble and dying in
the hall =)

Shada

> Speaking for myself, Lullaby worked a helluva lot better at
> 18 than it did
> at 31. I happen to be one of the bards who got caught in the
> stealth nerf
> of Lullaby so long ago. One day I was saving my party from
> certain death,
> then the stealth nerf goes in, and now instead of saving the
> party, I save
> everyone but myself. So for the few of us still around from
> release, I know
> how useful the song used to be.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
